DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare motor learning ( ML ) -based gait-related training intervention functional low limb strength training intervention , concurrent evaluation functional , neural participation outcome child youth Cerebral Palsy ( CP ) . This study two-group , parallel arm RCT twenty-two child CP GMFCS Levels I-II randomly allocate 6-week , 16 session program : ( ) ML base gait training ( ii ) low limb strength training . Outcome assessment occur pre/post/4-months post-intervention .
